version_description:
+ We fixed a bug that made some video transfers slower than usual
+ As always, please send us your feedback, suggestions and comments to make the app better: support@phototransferapp.com

If you have a moment please review the app, it means the world to us indie developers!

+ We fixed a bug that affected users on iOS 9.3 - Thanks to all of our awesome users who helped us identify and fix this problem!!
+ As always, please send us your feedback, suggestions and comments to make the app better: support@phototransferapp.com
+++ If you have a moment please review the app, it means the world to us! +++

+ We fixed a bug that was affecting users of the Flickr plugin
Thanks for sending us your feedback and for helping us making the app better!

INTRODUCING the Photo Transfer App extension! Now you can transfer directly from ANY app using the share button. This makes the transfer process even easier and directly from your favorite apps. We hope you will enjoy this new functionality!

As always your feedback and reviews of the app are very appreciated! Send us your comments or suggestions: support@phototransferapp.com or on twitter: @phototransfer

INTRODUCING the Photo Transfer App extension! Now you can transfer directly from ANY app using the share button. This makes the transfer process even easier and directly from your favorite apps. We hope you will enjoy this new functionality!

As always your feedback and reviews of the app are very appreciated! Send us your comments or suggestions: support@phototransferapp.com or on twitter: @phototransfer

INTRODUCING the Photo Transfer App extension! Now you can transfer directly from ANY app using the share button. This makes the transfer process even easier and directly from your favorite apps. We hope you will enjoy this new functionality!

As always your feedback and reviews of the app are very appreciated! Send us your comments or suggestions: support@phototransferapp.com or on twitter: @phototransfer
+ Bug fixes and minor adjustments to support iOS10
+ This update fixes an issue that affected users that are still using iOS7

We are very excited to introduce version 6.2 of Photo Transfer App! Here is the new stuff:
► Support to transfer original + edited versions of your photos using our desktop app
► Support to transfer live photos as JPG or MOV from device to computer
► Support to transfer all representations of an asset (for JPG+RAW for example) from device to computer
► Added a new sort control to our Mac application
► The app will now detect duplicates when saving to device and prompt you to skip or save duplicates
► Improved support to download iCloud Photo Library assets via the web browser method

We hope you will find this update useful!! As always please send us your comments and suggestions to: support@phototransferapp.com

- Fixed issue that prevented Live Photos to upload using the Google Drive plugin
- Implemented new authentication mechanism for Google Drive plugin

► Updated the Dropbox plugin to use the latest version of the Dropbox SDK
► Fixed an issue where the Google Drive plugin would not show all elements in a folder

► Support to convert HEIC to JPG! With this new update we added a setting to automatically convert photos in HEIC format to JPG when transferring to other devices and with our cloud plugins
► Fixed issue that caused the Dropbox plugin not to work with team accounts
► Fixed issue that caused some video downloads to fail from Google Drive

► Added support for automatic HEIC to JPG conversion when a receiving device does not support saving in HEIC format
► Fixed issue that was causing screenshots not to upload to Google Drive

► Improved user interface to support iPhone X
► Fixed an issue that was causing some large video transfers to fail when the videos were stored in iCloud Photo Library

- Support to transfer edited video files
Please let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions for the app: support@phototransferapp.com

- Fixed upload issue in the 'Send to someone' feature for screenshot files
- Fixed issue where some files where not saved with the original file name
- Other bug fixes and improvements
Please let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions for the app: support@phototransferapp.com

New on 7.1.1:
► Fixed the error some users where getting when upgrading the app
New on 7.1
► Now you can also share videos using our new "Send to Someone" feature
► Fixed a bug when creating a new album with special characters
► Implemented a fix to make large video downloads faster and more reliable

Photo Transfer App 7.0 is here! We are so excited to introduce 2 new awesome features:
► "Send to someone" allows you to share photos with anyone in the world using a private link. We created this feature to provide the easiest and most secure way to share photos between people.
► USB cable transfers! Now you can also use the USB cable to transfer photos and videos between your PC and your device (Available for PC transfers only, Mac USB transfers coming later this year). This is great when you may not have access to a Wi-Fi network or want to transfer a lot of data quickly
► Now you can also transfer from and to OneDrive as part of our cloud services plugins

We also made a lot of improvements to speed and reliability. We hope you will enjoy this update and the new features! Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have any question or comments: support@phototransferapp.com

New on 7.0.1:
► Minor bug fix on the new OneDrive plugin

► Fixed a problem that was causing an error when downloading from a shared album

► Fixed an issue when downloading medium resolution images of live photos
► The app now detects duplicate files before saving them to the library when doing a device to device transfer

► Now you can also share videos using our new "Send to Someone" feature
► Fixed a bug when creating a new album with special characters
► Minor bug fixes and improvements
